EmailTemplate.name: R&OI Source Inspection Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your order is ready for Source Inspection - PO: {!ROI_Order_Information__c.Purchase_Order_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
This is with reference to your PO Number {!ROI_Order_Information__c.Purchase_Order_Number__c} and Honeywell Sales Order Number {!ROI_Order_Information__c.Sales_Order_Number__c}. Your part is ready for Source inspection. Please Refer to attached document for more details.
For any questions related to this, please contact Honeywell Customer Service.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: https://myaerospace.honeywell.com
